organization.name: Fremnatos
organization.full_name: Fremnatos Elders, Mentally Disabled and Children Charity Organization
organization.description: Fremnatos Elders, Mentally Disabled and Children Charity Organization

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide comprehensive support and care for elders, mentally disabled individuals, and children in the Tigray region, ensuring they receive the dignity and assistance they deserve.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: In the 2020/21 fiscal year, this is an effort to provide better services and help solve the problems of people without support in the Tigray region. This organization was established to support elders, mentally disabled people and children.

values.title: Values
values.description:
• Helping unsupported people without discrimination
• Treating everyone equally
• Commitment and striving for change
• Honesty and working together
• Transparency and accountability

objectives.title: Specific Objectives

hero.title: Supporting Elders, Mentally Disabled, and Children in Need
hero.description: Fremnatos Charity Organization is dedicated to providing better services and solving problems for people without support in the Tigray region. Join us in making a meaningful impact.

urgency.title: Every Day Matters
urgency.description: Your support helps us reach more people in need every single day.

donation.title: Your Support Changes Lives
donation.subtitle: Every contribution, no matter the size, makes a real difference in the lives of elders, children, and those with mental disabilities.

slide1.title: Vision
slide1.description: Fremnatos is a center established by Aba Samuel and Aba Gebremedhn Berhe with good intentions and legal documents dated Miyazia-7/2010 E.C. in the main center of Mekelle city with 26 branches. These founding fathers have set a great goal to serve the community, and they have used their spiritual books and the money collected from the spiritual children inside and outside the country to buy land and budget to start this good foundation. They have made this institution a model for the people and government, and it has been running for more than 5 years.

slide2.title: Mission
slide2.description: To provide comprehensive services to unsupported elders, mentally disabled people and children, and to help them overcome their social, economic and psychological problems, as well as to provide all the necessary support for their work through various fundraising activities and to provide comprehensive support to reduce all kinds of poverty.

slide3.title: Our Team
slide3.description: A diverse group of passionate professionals committed to excellence, innovation, and making a meaningful impact in everything we do.

slide4.title: Values
slide4.description:
• Helping unsupported people without discrimination
• Treating everyone equally
• Commitment and striving for change
• Honesty and working together
• Transparency and accountability

slide5.title: Specific Objectives

footer.description: Making a difference in communities through compassion and action.
